import React from 'react' import gsap from 'gsap' class Header extends React.Component { render () { function toggleMenu () { const element = document.getElementById('menu_toggle') element.classList.toggle('active') const menu = document.getElementById('nav--mobile') menu.classList.toggle('active') } gsap.set('#nav--mobile', { opacity: 0, x:300 }) return (
